title: Cafe Bekfar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Cafe located in a retirement village off Route 4 (Geha Rd) at Dror Interchange halfway between Tel Aviv and Haifa. Jan 2016 reported under new ownership. No longer a separate vegan menu but main menu does mark the vegan choices.
streetAddress: Protea Village near Drorim Shopping Mall
